channel.title: How low can people possibly go?
channel.description:
So , this tuesday my principal said i had to go to the study ( remain at school for 1hr after school is done ) for no reason at all for the rest of the year , above that , my french teacher monster-raged at me for being on a part of the school that's restricted to people from my class ( even though all my other friends were there , she just raged at me ). So that day when i come home , i post a mini - rage post on Facebook , then just ignored the whole thing...
Today however , some nerd printed my post and every comment on it and hung it up in my french teacher's classroom , the secretary and another teacher's class....
How fuckin' low can people go?

item.title: How low can people possibly go?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:77, topic:395656”][quote author=Cres link=topic=492849.msg3609436#msg3609436 date=1306429388]

It’s funny how i’m laughing throughout the whole thing whilst you’re the one raging to defend yourself without any valid points.
Let me guess how you think about war ; " If there weren’t any people on this planet there wouldn’t be any war" , that’s what you’d think right?

Well he’d be thinking right, there wouldn’t be any wars if there weren’t any people on this planet…
I don’t even know how you drew the conclusion that he would think that though…

I think i see why you don’t understand anything i’ve written so far ; because you’re clearly fucking illiterate.

Does anybody else see the irony here? Maybe I’m the only one… From this thread I have compiled some characteristics of Cres.

Cress is…

[ul][li]ignorant[/li]
[li]illiterate[/li]
[li]a person who does poorly in school[/li]
[li]a person who blames others for everything (see ignorant)[/li]
[li]someone who claims to be above others (“laughing” at them) when he is clearly not[/li]
[li]bad at grammar (see illiterate)[/li]
[li]an idiot[/li][/ul]

  • So you call me ignorant for looking at the whole event from a different aspect?
  • Illiterate , how? In this whole thread i’ve used correct english whereas most people have written their posts as if they were 6 year olds.
  • 6/10 As a minimum =/= poorly. ( taking in account i have this thing called a ‘Life’.)
  • I never said it was anybody’s fault ; in the case with the teachers there was an error with communication , as for the person printing off my post , it only says somthing about that person ( in a way that i think is low. )
  • Laughing at someone doesn’t neccesarily mean that you are ( or even think ) that you’re above someone else.
  • That’s your personal opinion ; i couldn’t care less about you or about your opinions or thoughts.

Please try again.

[/quote]
Correct grammar? No.

word , words is not correct grammar . See it doesn’t seem right , and it is dumb looking and it makes my eyes bleed .[/quote]

As does leaving a space between the . and the last word of each of your sentences.
Also , I can’t stop laughing at these dipshits proving themselves superior just because they critisize other people’s grammar.
AND douchebags like kingman trying to prove somthing to those dipshits by joining them , LOL.

I seriously wonder how these guys wil be like when they eventually grow up.

Read full topic

Well he’d be thinking right, there wouldn’t be any wars if there weren’t any people on this planet…
I don’t even know how you drew the conclusion that he would think that though…

I think i see why you don’t understand anything i’ve written so far ; because you’re clearly fucking illiterate.

Does anybody else see the irony here? Maybe I’m the only one… From this thread I have compiled some characteristics of Cres.

Cress is…

[ul][li]ignorant[/li]
[li]illiterate[/li]
[li]a person who does poorly in school[/li]
[li]a person who blames others for everything (see ignorant)[/li]
[li]someone who claims to be above others (“laughing” at them) when he is clearly not[/li]

[/quote]

  • So you call me ignorant for looking at the whole event from a different aspect?
  • Illiterate , how? In this whole thread i’ve used correct english whereas most people have written their posts as if they were 6 year olds.
  • 6/10 As a minimum =/= poorly. ( taking in account i have this thing called a ‘Life’.)
  • I never said it was anybody’s fault ; in the case with the teachers there was an error with communication , as for the person printing off my post , it only says somthing about that person ( in a way that i think is low. )

word , words is not correct grammar . See it doesn’t seem right , and it is dumb looking and it makes my eyes bleed .

item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:70, topic:395656”][quote author=`Alec link=topic=492849.msg3611665#msg3611665 date=1306636854]

lol @ you’re calm, lol. (lol)

i’m not raging; just pointing out your inanity

and ignorance
and arrogance
and… fragrance

Oh and the total lack of ability to see what is in front of him because he does not like what he sees.
[/quote]

Funny how you keep hitting me after Jc tries to.

I didn’t know MoparScape was a place to rant about shit. I think MoparScape needs a “Ranting Threads That Nobody Really Gives A Shit About” section.

That sounded like a rant.[/quote]
It was more of a question than a rant. It actually wasn’t a rant at all. Read carefully.

item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:66, topic:395656”][quote author=Cres link=topic=492849.msg3610852#msg3610852 date=1306572671]

What if the teacher/principal printed out the post and taped it on the wall so he/she could get you in trouble?

On the page that had been printed off there was also a chat conversation with a student of our school.
I’ve checked everyone who could have been that person but none of teachers have that person as a friend , so no.
[/quote]

That’s easy. Just look for the idiot who doesn’t know how to crop a photo.[/quote]

I did ; there are like 5 people who dont know enough about computers to do so xD

item.source: How low can people possibly go?

item.title: How low can people possibly go?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

m1lkman:

What if the teacher/principal printed out the post and taped it on the wall so he/she could get you in trouble?

On the page that had been printed off there was also a chat conversation with a student of our school.
I’ve checked everyone who could have been that person but none of teachers have that person as a friend , so no.

[quote="`Alec, post:8, topic:395681"][quote author=Cres link=topic=492849.msg3609436#msg3609436 date=1306429388]

  • So you call me ignorant for looking at the whole event from a different aspect?
  • Illiterate , how? In this whole thread i’ve used correct english whereas most people have written their posts as if they were 6 year olds.
  • 6/10 As a minimum =/= poorly. ( taking in account i have this thing called a ‘Life’.)
  • I never said it was anybody’s fault ; in the case with the teachers there was an error with communication , as for the person printing off my post , it only says somthing about that person ( in a way that i think is low. )
  • Laughing at someone doesn’t neccesarily mean that you are ( or even think ) that you’re above someone else.
  • That’s your personal opinion ; i couldn’t care less about you or about your opinions or thoughts.
    [/quote]

Ignorant because you blame others more than yourself. A lot.
As JC pointed out: no ; you, havent.
I have a life, my minimum is 8/10 (fucking science man, what are you going to do) and I consider that poor.
You said you wanted to punch the person who printed it off in the face, and that your punishment was a result of them doing what they did.
As long as you acknowledge that Jc is way above you, sure, laugh all you want. Just know that you are laughing at yourself.

An idiot, dolt, or dullard is a mentally deficient person, or someone who acts in a self-defeating or significantly counterproductive way. ...

You act extremely self-defeating and counterproductive. It’s not an opinion.[/quote]

  1. I’m not even gonna try to defend that argument as you just don’t seem to understand anything i’ve posted regarding it.
  2. Just because i like to use reading marks such as , and ; doesn’t mean my English isn’t correct.
  3. Try to see 6/10 as a nullpointer : anything under it is bad , anything above it is good.
  4. Yes , it kind of is.
  5. I’m laughing at the fact that I can remain calm whilst he is raging at me , how does that have anything to do with him/me being lower/higher then him/me.
  6. In my eyes you are being counterproductive towards me whilst I seem counterproductive to you ; it’s an opinion.

Read full topic

It’s funny how i’m laughing throughout the whole thing whilst you’re the one raging to defend yourself without any valid points.
Let me guess how you think about war ; " If there weren’t any people on this planet there wouldn’t be any war" , that’s what you’d think right?

Well he’d be thinking right, there wouldn’t be any wars if there weren’t any people on this planet…
I don’t even know how you drew the conclusion that he would think that though…

I think i see why you don’t understand anything i’ve written so far ; because you’re clearly fucking illiterate.

Does anybody else see the irony here? Maybe I’m the only one… From this thread I have compiled some characteristics of Cres.

Cress is…

[ul][li]ignorant[/li]
[li]illiterate[/li]
[li]a person who does poorly in school[/li]
[li]a person who blames others for everything (see ignorant)[/li]
[li]someone who claims to be above others (“laughing” at them) when he is clearly not[/li]
[li]bad at grammar (see illiterate)[/li]
[li]an idiot[/li][/ul]

  • So you call me ignorant for looking at the whole event from a different aspect?
  • Illiterate , how? In this whole thread i’ve used correct english whereas most people have written their posts as if they were 6 year olds.
  • 6/10 As a minimum =/= poorly. ( taking in account i have this thing called a ‘Life’.)
  • I never said it was anybody’s fault ; in the case with the teachers there was an error with communication , as for the person printing off my post , it only says somthing about that person ( in a way that i think is low. )
  • Laughing at someone doesn’t neccesarily mean that you are ( or even think ) that you’re above someone else.
  • That’s your personal opinion ; i couldn’t care less about you or about your opinions or thoughts.

Please try again.

oh; by the , way work on, your , grammar ; please[/quote]

Because your comments aren’t really constructive / helpfull / logic / reasonable / productive / …
The reason i “spew random bullshit as a comeback” is because you simply don’t understand anything i’m trying to say.

I’ll work on my English the second you decide to work on how you react to statements and opinions of other people.

item.title: How low can people possibly go?
item.dc:creator: @Azu Azu
item.description:
@Azu wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:16, topic:395656”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=492849.msg3603315#msg3603315 date=1305836003]

[quote author=Cres link=topic=492849.msg3603308#msg3603308 date=1305835504]

…but this is 100% your own doing, so don’t whine about it…

how is this my fault?
this you have to explain to me; what exactly did i do wrong?
[/quote]Well for one, you posted the rant. Number two, you aren’t telling us the entire story. Even mentally ill people wouldn’t do this over ‘nothing’.

my post was:“fuck you”+teachers name+", fuck you"+principals name

how is that threathening?
i admit posting that wasn’t the smartest thing to do ; but printing off a post and hanging it up at school aisnt really the first thing i’d do as a person , and even if i did , i would at least say it was me.

what i did , in comparison to Mr. Anonymous , is nothing.
[/quote]Are you kidding? Saying ‘fuck you’ is always bad

First , saying “Fuck you” is somthing we all say at least once a day , at least here on my school…
However , we are always polite towards our teachers , i have never offended them in any way.

Second , i don’t know who printed that post , so i don’t know myself why that person did it…
If he has a good reason for it then i’d be more respectfull towards him , but i’ve never really done anything wrong with the intention of hurting someone , so nobody has the right to do such a thing to me…[/quote]
^lies

Read full topic

item.source: How low can people possibly go?

item.title: How low can people possibly go?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:55, topic:395656”][quote author=Cres link=topic=492849.msg3607309#msg3607309 date=1306214517]
I’m pretty much laughing at (Anthony) , Jc22493 and Davidi2’s posts , as none of you three seem to get what my point is.[/quote]
nor do you see our points which are obviously more valid than yours

6/10 is just good enough (i’m not proud of it ; but i consider it as a minimum and i’ve always been above it.) ; i don’t know what your parents problem is Anthony , but hitting 10/10 for every test is merely impossible on my school.

6/10 is nowhere near good enough and if scoring 10/10 on every test is impossible, the whole school is probably filled with inane minds like yours… (that would explain your ineptitude)

Secondly , if 9 teachers tell you its ok and 1 teacher tells you to not do it ; what the hell would you do?
(keep in mind that that teacher never confronted us with the fact that we weren’t allowed up there ; all the others said it was OK).

use some common sense let me go with the old saying, if 9 teachers tell you to engage in sexual activities with your mother and only one tells you otherwise, what would you do? i hope you wouldn’t make the same blunder you did here

It just troubles me to see people who are (pretending to be) high ranked act like complete idiots

quite amusing seeing as our comments depict you as a simpleton

And yes i do admit that posting the post on FB wasn’t smart ; but you don’t expect some idiot to post it off and hang it up at school , its somthing we as humans don’t do and don’t think of others who’d do it.

if you don’t take into account consequences as a result of idiotic actions, then you’re just mad ignorant bro

anyways, this whole thing is your fault. why? if you never took the first step of posting shit on fb, there would have been nothing to print out. deal with the mockery, suck it up, and don’t do it again. stop raging and trying to make yourself feel better on moparscape it won’t work[/quote]

It’s funny how i’m laughing throughout the whole thing whilst you’re the one raging to defend yourself without any valid points.
Let me guess how you think about war ; " If there weren’t any people on this planet there wouldn’t be any war" , that’s what you’d think right?

Also , you just took my statement , turned it 180 degrees and say it’s the same ; i can’t say anything else but this:
GL in your life

Read full topic
item.source: How low can people possibly go?

6/10 is just good enough (i’m not proud of it ; but i consider it as a minimum and i’ve always been above it.) ; i don’t know what your parents problem is Anthony , but hitting 10/10 for every test is merely impossible on my school.

[quote=“Cres, post:52, topic:395656”]Secondly , if 9 teachers tell you its ok and 1 teacher tells you to not do it ; what the hell would you do?
(keep in mind that that teacher never confronted us with the fact that we weren’t allowed up there ; all the others said it was OK).[/quote]
use some common sense let me go with the old saying, if 9 teachers tell you to engage in sexual activities with your mother and only one tells you otherwise, what would you do? i hope you wouldn’t make the same blunder you did here

Cres:

It just troubles me to see people who are (pretending to be) high ranked act like complete idiots

quite amusing seeing as our comments depict you as a simpleton

Cres:

And yes i do admit that posting the post on FB wasn’t smart ; but you don’t expect some idiot to post it off and hang it up at school , its somthing we as humans don’t do and don’t think of others who’d do it.

if you don’t take into account consequences as a result of idiotic actions, then you’re just mad ignorant bro

anyways, this whole thing is your fault. why? if you never took the first step of posting shit on fb, there would have been nothing to print out. deal with the mockery, suck it up, and don’t do it again. stop raging and trying to make yourself feel better on moparscape it won’t work

Read full topic
item.source: How low can people possibly go?

Cres:

but i’ve learned my lesson , changed my FB settings to private

This was your problem why…
